Create a password Create your password to login. Password Confirm password Create and log in Congratulations! You have successfully login. I don't want to see a tutorial Begin with short tutorial of the app Log in Log in to manage your rides. Outside geofenced area You are not within the geofenced area of the trip. Are you sure you selected the correct one? Yes Cancel GPS is turned off The app cannot be used without GPS. Please enable GPS to continue. Go to settings

Are you sure you want to cancel the ride? Please select a reason for cancellation and choose where to transfer the trip details Select a reason Traffic or road blockage Technical issue with the bus Wrong ride selected Accident on the road Other Data transfer Select data destination Not selected Confirm Cancellation Go Back Internet connected
